Question.Subject: Do you know of any websites that I can upload my designs and place them on items to be sold (Like Salt Life)?
Question.Content:
I am looking for businesses that will allow you to upload your own designs and place them on T-Shirts or whatever, possibly pre-cut decals to put on a vehicle.
I am wanting to create similar items without having to manage with the shipping and production of the T-shirts or stickers.
Question.ChosenAnswer: http://www.stickeryou.com will allow you to upload your own art and convert them to stickers.

Answer.Content: http://www.stickeryou.com will allow you to upload your own art and convert them to stickers.
